Introduction

Lee Jae Jin is a South Korean musician, singer, and actor under FNC Entertainment. He is a member of the boy band FTISLAND and its sub unit FT.Triple.

He made his Japanese solo debut on October 9, 2019 with his first mini album scene.27.

Jun 7, 2007
